Text: Awesome.  I've been looking for a great set of basic actions.

so are these photoshop filters then?

cos iv been looking for a few more to get the most out of CS3 seeing as im only a novice?

Blazer - no they are not filters

Actions are scripts used by photoshop to carry out specific functions on a photograph.  For example an action can reduce the file size, give it a border and sharpen (if that is what you want it to do.

Suggest you try looking for Lynda.com products
